backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing chat sessions, Puro response generation, user profiles, guest-session routing, and authorization mixin integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting principal‑keyed chat and profile maps to text‑keyed versions for the new storage format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for the guest‑mode update.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file involved in the chat and guest‑session features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theming for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component loading the caller profile and showing a profile setup modal before rendering the chat page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer with textarea, Enter-to-send behavior, send button, and action message indicator.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Scrollable message list rendering chat bubbles or an empty-state prompt.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders individual chat messages with Puro/user styling and action/dialogue formatting.
Avatar component displaying Puro’s image in various sizes.
frontend/src/components/layout/ChatLayou: Provides the main chat page layout with header, footer, and children content slot.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting the user to enter a display name and saves it via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestSessionId.ts: Returns a stable guest session ID using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for loading and saving user profiles and sending/receiving chat messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface page handling message history, sending messages, and displaying composer and transcript.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears guest session IDs using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and container settings for the app’s theme.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state metadata, feature list, and requirements for an AI chat app roleplaying as Puro.
